amendment.description: To make available additional funds for the Commission on Review of Overseas Military Facility Structure of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3661 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3661 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S9242; text: CR S9242) To make available additional funds for the Commission on Review of Overseas Military Facility Structure of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3661 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3661 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
